content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (61.0, -54.0) fueled with coal, currently full with iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (64.0, -53.0) fueled with coal, currently full with iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (61.5, -52.5) containing coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (62.5, -53.5) containing coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (62.5, -52.5) containing coal.

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) fueled with coal, extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -83.5) storing coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (42.5, -83.5) storing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -83.5) transferring coal from the mining drill to the wooden chest.

## ERROR TIPS

### Furnace Output Full Warning
- Ensure to regularly collect iron plates from the furnaces to prevent production halts due to full output inventory.

## NAMESPACE

### Utility Functions
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent in the provided logs.

### Important Variables
- `inventory`: Dict[str, int] - Tracks the current inventory of the agent.
- `entities_on_map`: List[Entity] - Represents the entities currently present on the map.

No utility functions have been invoked or defined, and no new variables have been assigned beyond those mentioned.
